mapper.select: SELECT P.POS_NAME AS POS_NAME , M.GM_NICKNAME AS GM_NICKNAME FROM POSITION_APPOINT A JOIN POSITION P ON A.POS_CODE = P.POS_CODE JOIN GROUP_MEMBER M ON A.GM_CODE1 = M.GM_CODE JOIN GROUP_INVITE I ON M.GI_CODE = I.GI_CODE WHERE I.CG_CODE = #{cg_code} AND P.POS_CODE IN (1,2)
SELECT COUNT(GM_CODE) AS GM_COUNT FROM GROUP_MEMBER WHERE GI_CODE IN ( SELECT GI_CODE FROM GROUP_INVITE WHERE CG_CODE = #{cg_code})

SELECT M.GM_NICKNAME AS GM_NICKNAME, P.POS_NAME AS POS_NAME,TO_CHAR(TRUNC(M.GM_REGDATE)) AS GM_REGDATE , M.GM_INTRO AS GM_INTRO, M.GM_PROFILE AS GM_PROFILE FROM POSITION_APPOINT A JOIN POSITION P ON A.POS_CODE = P.POS_CODE JOIN GROUP_MEMBER M ON A.GM_CODE1 = M.GM_CODE WHERE M.GM_CODE = #{gm_code}
